mapper.update: update blog_post set post_hits = post_hits + 1 where post_no = #{post_no}
update post_comment set post_comment_like = post_comment_like + 1 where post_comment_no = #{post_comment_no} and post_comment_writter != #{post_comment_writter}
mapper.select: select post_comment_no , post_no , post_comment_writter , post_comment_content , to_char(post_comment_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') post_comment_date , post_comment_like from post_comment where post_no = #{post_no} order by post_comment_no desc

select count(*) from blog_post where user_id = #{user_id} and
post_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
select book_title from book_info where book_title like '%' || #{text} || '%'
